group_1.textLeft: All right!@Let's go all out today!
Woohooo!

group_1.textRight: We're looking for what selling points the village has,@right? Where should we search?

group_1.textLeft: Let's start by looking at the river!
As the Shogun said,
"A good village has clean water. That alone is worth@something."

group_1.textRight: Then that means our water is clean, so we don't@need to check, right?

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, there are lots of villages with clean water,
So that by itself isn't enough to draw people.
Instead, we're going there to look for other@attractions.
That's what the shogun did, after all!

group_1.textRight: So by going to the water source, the shogun was@able to find other attractions...

group_1.textLeft: No, that's not entirely it... When the shogun went@there, all he found was just a mucky, stinky old@watering hole.
He almost gave up...[chara:102601:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:102601:cheek_0][chara:102601:face_mtn_ex_050.exp.json:motion_400][chara:102601:lipSynch_1]but then he found gold!

group_1.textRight: So...we're going to look for gold, too?

group_1.textLeft: Exactly!

group_1.textRight: Hmm, I wonder if we'll find any...?

group_1.textCenter: ...Yep, just as we thought, the water here is@beautiful!
But it doesn't stink like mud...and there doesn't@seem to be any gold dust.

group_1.textRight: I don't think you can detect gold through the smell@of the water...

group_1.textLeft: [chara:102601:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Huh? Really?!

group_1.textRight: I read in a book that if there's a mine upstream,@then it's possible to find gold in the water.
I've never heard of anything like that around here,@though.

group_1.textLeft: Ah...so that's that, then...

group_1.textRight: ...Well, even if we can't find any gold here, there are@better things we can do!

group_1.textLeft: Hm...? A fishing rod?!@When did you...?!

group_1.textRight: This place is my fishing spot, so I keep some stuff@tucked away nearby.

group_1.textLeft: Wha! Huh?! What about bait?@Can you catch fish without it?!

group_1.textRight: Shh, Charu...you have to be quiet or the fish will@escape.

group_1.textLeft: Ah...mmph!

group_1.textRight: ...Yes! That's one tasty char, fresh out of the river!

group_1.textLeft: Oooooh! Shizuka, you're amazing!
The Shaking Shogun would be so mindblown if he@saw this! He'd be stomping his feet all over the place!
If you want some delicious fish,
You just have to ask Shizuka, our expert fishergirl!
She can catch them even without any bait!
That'll be one of our big appeals!
Yeah, it's something you can't find in any other@village!
Alright, let's go to our next stop!
